name: Galactic Blasters Zero - Frozen Dwarf Planet
name_original: Galactic Blasters Zero - Frozen Dwarf Planet
description:
Galactic Blasters Zero - Frozen Dwarf Planet is the 3.5rd Galactic Blasters game.

It is a horizontally scrolling space shooter game that takes place in the May of 2044, where one of the original members of the H.D.E. is sent on a mission to the frozen dwarf planet called Miopra, which was taken over by the enemy years prior.

[Rating - RGAR 1] [Game - v1.00]
